node.text: If the young readers in your life are taking part in #HarryPotterReadingMagic we have this great 'Marble House Point Jars' DIY. Take part in weekly chapter challenges and earn house points. See how many they can earn as we explore the first book. Head to the link in our bio to find this week's chapter challenge

node.title: Wizarding World | Marble House Point Jars

node.text:
Each week for #HarryPotterReadingMagic we'll be listening to some of the extracts from the first book read by Stephen Fry. For week one we've chosen this conversation between Dumbledore and McGonagall. 

Until July 31st, listen to Harry Potter and the Philosopher's/Sorcerer's Stone for free with Alexa, just say 'Alexa, read Harry Potter Book One'

node.title: Harry Potter Reading Magic | Week One

node.text:
See singer-songwriter and lifelong Harry Potter fan @LiamPayne launch the Deck the Great Hall experience with his own special message. Head to the link in our bio to send your message to a loved one this Christmas. 

#WizardingWorldChristmas

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 20, 2021. May be an image of 2 people, people standing and text.

node.text: Hermione may have accused Ron of having the emotional range of a teaspoon, but the pair provided us with many 'aww' inducing moments. How much do you know about the couple? Head to the link in our bio to find out

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 20, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'THE OFFICIAL Harly Potter BAKING BOOK =40+ RECIPES INSPIRED By THE FILMS WIZARDING WORLD SCHOLASTIC'.

node.text: Channel your inner Molly Weasley with the only official Harry Potter cookbook. Bake your way through Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry with over 40 recipes inspired by the films. Head to the link in our bio to get yours

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 19, 2021. May be a closeup of 1 person and standing.

node.text: "Don't call me Nymphadora, Remus," said the young witch with a shudder. "It's Tonks." We meet the Auror Tonks in the Order of the Phoenix. What were your first impressions of her and did they change?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 19, 2021. May be an image of one or more people.

node.text: The first time you read Philosopher's/Sorcerer's Stone did you know to read the Mirror of Erised inscription backwards? If you're taking part in #HarryPotterReadingMagic did the children you're reading with make the connection?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 18, 2021. May be an image of 2 people and indoor.

node.text: How do you think the stories would have been different if Lily had been placed in Slytherin or Severus in Gryffindor?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 18, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and indoor.

node.text: The wizarding world may be the hub of adventure in the series but Harry's summers in the Muggle world weren't uneventful. How many of these memorable moments can you recall?  Head to the link in our bio to find out.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 16, 2021. May be an illustration of 5 people.

node.text: This week there's a troll in the dungeon and Harry's first Quidditch game as we explore the themes of Friendships, Fun & Family in #HarryPotterReadingMagic. Delve into our themed activities from chapters 10-13 by heading to the link in our bio.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 15, 2021. May be an image of one or more people, people standing and outdoors.

node.text: On this day in Harry Potter history Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 debuted in cinemas. Can you remember your reaction?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 14, 2021. May be an image of 2 people, people sitting and indoor.

node.text: Classes aside - if you had been able to join Harry, Ron and Hermione at Hogwarts, how would you spend your free time? Would you visit Hagrid in his hut or maybe become a Gobstones pro? Let us know.

node.text: Showcase your house pride and never lose your page again with these Hogwarts house-themed bookmarks #HarryPotterReadingMagic

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 12, 2021. May be an image of 6 people, people standing and text.

node.text: In Prisoner of Azkaban, the director Alfonso Cuarón encouraged the actors to wear their uniforms how they wanted. If you got the chance to go to Hogwarts how would you make yours personal to you?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 11, 2021. May be an image of bird.

node.text:
Gryffindor and Ravenclaw are currently most likely to pick a phoenix as their favourite beast in the Harry Potter Fan Club. Can you guess what the top choices are for Hufflepuff and Slytherin? 

Head to the link in our bio to select your favourites in your Wizarding World passport.
